last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 2
last_episode_to_air.overview: Ian Wright charts the inspiring rise of black footballers from Viv Anderson's debut as the first black man to play for England in 1978. With contributions from an all-star football cast, including Ashley Cole, Raheem Sterling, John Barnes, Paul Ince, Rhian Brewster and Gareth Southgate.

name: Out of Their Skin
overview: In this documentary miniseries, football legend Ian Wright investigates the black players of the Premiere League, and the abuse that they endured based on the colour of their skin.
